thread.title: Lexus NX 300h 2016 Bentley Mulsanne Speed
thread.title_full: Video: 2015 Lexus NX 300h & 2016 Bentley Mulsanne Speed | Watch MotorWeek Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Lexus NX 300h 2016 Bentley Mulsanne Speed
text: In this episode, we see how smoothly hybrid power and luxury come together in the Lexus NX 300h. Pat Goss has a few quick and smart touch up tips. Zach Maskell takes an “Over The Edge” look at where our modern cars got their start. Yolanda Vazquez shows us how the OBDII port is vulnerable to exploitation. Later, we cruise way out of our price range in the Bentley Mulsanne Speed.
